buff.name: twitch_cooldown
buff.description_key: Cannot be targeted by Twitch Actions for the duration of the buff.

buff.name: SAN
buff.description_key: [00FFFF]SAN值多少反映理智的强弱，当低于40%时会陷入噩梦纠缠,若死于噩梦纠缠会造成可怕的后果.\n[FF0000]低SAN对古神的伤害会有所下降.\n[FF0000]提高调查员等级可与之抗衡.

buff.name: 理智恢复
buff.description_key: [00FFFF]理智恢复.

buff.name: 阿撒托斯之印
